alert.note: Alert for Northeast Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk; Southern Nassau; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 25 at 3:47AM EST until February 25 at 10:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Combined snow and sleet accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations up to around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Northeast Suffolk, Southwest Suffolk, Southeast Suffolk and Southern Nassau Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Check local Department of Transportation information services for the latest road conditions.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk; Southern Nassau; Southwest Suffolk
